title: 3BD 2BA $1500 OFF Move In Special On Select Units
posting_body: ['Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Separate dining area', '-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', '-Professional onsite management', '-Polished kitchen countertops', '-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity', '-Mountain views', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', '-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
